org.apertereports.dao.utils
Class WHS<resultType>

java.lang.Object
  org.apertereports.dao.utils.WHS<resultType>

public abstract class WHS<resultType>
extends Object

This generic class handles the opening and closing Hibernate session. It can also wrap an invocation into transaction. Designed to be used as an inner anonymous class.

          A Hibernate session retrieved from SQLUtil.

Method Detail

lambda

public abstract resultType lambda()
This method should be implemented to use a current Hibernate session.

Returns:
Returns a result of type specified by the generic parameter.

p

public resultType p()
The main workhorse of this class. Retrieves the session from SQLUtil and wraps the invocation of lambda() into transaction.

Returns:
The object returned by lambda()
